text.value: Great news! Please continue to closely monitor her.
Is baby still experiencing any danger signs?
Please indicate which danger signs is experiencing.
should visit the health facility immediately if she is experiencing any of these danger signs.
Please advise her to do so and accompany her if possible.
Did baby visit the health facility as recommended?
Guardian agrees to inform nurse of address change
Nurse contact information shared with guardian

bind.calculate: if(selected(../fever, 'yes') or selected(../severe_headache, 'yes') or selected(../vaginal_bleeding, 'yes') or selected(../vaginal_discharge, 'yes') or selected(../convulsion, 'yes'), 'yes', if(selected(../severe_headache, 'no') and selected(../vaginal_bleeding, 'no') and selected(../vaginal_discharge, 'no') and selected(../convulsion, 'no'), 'no', ''))
